section.header: Requirement in budget submission with respect to the cost per taxpayer of the deficit
section.text: Section 1105(a)of title 31, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by redesignatingparagraph (37)(relating to the list of outdated or duplicative plans and reports) asparagraph (39); and
by adding at the end the following:

in the case of a fiscal year in which the budget is projected to result in a deficit, an estimate of the pro rata cost of such deficit for taxpayers who will file individual income tax returns for taxable years ending during such fiscal year.
